name: Ext_R5_MedicationStatement_medication
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationStatement.medication for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationStatement.medication from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationStatement|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Identifies the medication being administered. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationStatement.medication` maps to R4B `MedicationStatement.medication[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
